### doc_1
Title: Synthetic Biography
This is a synthetic document for tests.
Albert Einstein received the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1921.
He later advised a US president during the Cuban Missile Crisis,
which involved the island nation of Cuba.

### doc_2
Title: Synthetic Crisis Timeline
This is a synthetic document for tests.
The Cuban Missile Crisis was a standoff in 1962.
It involved the United States and the island nation of Cuba.

### doc_3
Title: Synthetic Award List
This is a synthetic document for tests.
The Nobel Prize in Physics has been awarded since 1901.

### doc_4
Title: Synthetic Unrelated Note
This is a synthetic document for tests.
This document is unrelated to the question.
